price: And if We had made him an angel, We would have surely made him [appear as] a man[3], and We would have caused them confusion just as they are confused.
arabic: وَلَوۡ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ مَلَكٗا لَّجَعَلۡنَٰهُ رَجُلٗا وَلَلَبَسۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّا يَلۡبِسُونَ
footnotes: [3] This shows that they were not sincere in their demand.
